content.question: The authorâ€™s discussion of the medical profession in the first paragraph serves primarily to

choices.label: establish the historical argument supporting conventional medical practices before considering its validity
question a widespread assumption about the development of modern medical certification in order to challenge it
attribute the influence of the medical establishment to its political affiliations before objecting to those affiliations
emphasize the lack of scientific evidence for the effectiveness of certain alternative medical practices

content.answer: establish the historical argument supporting conventional medical practices before considering its validity

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
